steps.name: Launch the browser
Open URL for RAQ Form "https://8x8-preview.netlify.app/"
Click on Request a Demo button
Verify next button status of first steper
Verify Required messages for email
Verify error message when enter plain text and click on next button
Verify that next button status when user enter Business email
Verify that next button status when user enter valid Personal email
Verify email field with single space and multiple space only
Verify email field with Blocked Domains like -@foxmail.com
Verify email field with Blocked Domains like -@qq.com
Navigate To Second Step for Navigation
Verify next button status of second steper for First Name Last Name and Phone Number
Verify Required messages for First Name Last Name and Phone Number
Verify single space and multiple space for First Name Last Name and Phone fields
Verify First Name Last Name Phone fields with Special Characters
Verify First Name Last Name phone fields with Numeric Characters
Verify First Name Last Name Phone fields with emojis
Verify First Name Last Name with emojis and valid phone number
Verify First Name Last Name with emojis and Special Characters and valid phone number
Navigate to third Steper
Verify submit button status of Third steper With All empty Fields
Verify single space and multiple space for Company and No: of Employees fields
Verify Required messages for Company and No: of Employees
Verify Compnay and NOE with Special Characters
Verify Compnay and NOE with Numeric Characters
Verify Company and NOE fields with emojis
Verify Company and NOE with emojis and Special Characters
Verify Company with Special Characters and Other Form With Valid Data
Verify submit button status of Third steper For Country and Primary Interest with valid Data in Text Fields
Verify Selection of State Dropdown when Selcet Country as United Stated
Verify the Count of Country
Verify the Count of State
Verify the Count of Primary Interest
Submit the RAQ Form
